name: Maria Gonzalez
summary: Data analyst with 4 years of experience in the e-commerce sector. Skilled in Python and machine learning, specializing in deriving actionable insights from complex data sets.

experience.title: Senior Data Analyst
experience.description: Led a team in developing predictive models that optimized product recommendations, resulting in a 15% increase in cross-selling efficiency.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Performed cohort analysis to identify customer behavior patterns, leading to a 10% decrease in customer churn rate.

projects.name: Customer Segmentation Project
projects.description: Utilized K-means clustering to segment customer base, resulting in targeted marketing strategies and a 20% increase in conversion rates.

projects.name: Sales Forecasting Model
projects.description: Developed a machine learning model using time series analysis to predict sales trends accurately, improving forecasting accuracy by 25%.
